2016.giratina.bundle.2: Giratina Bundle: Wield the Shadow Claw!
2016.giratina.bundle.3: This awesome full-art Giratina can disrupt your opponent’s hand with its Shadow Claw attack! This bundle also includes three 10-card booster packs from Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Plasma Freeze, plus a cool Team Plasma coin. Turn to the shadows with Giratina today!
2016.giratina.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 3 Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Plasma Freeze booster packs (10-card) 1 foil Giratina Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, BW74) 1 Team Plasma coin These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through July 11, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.achievemen: Knock Out 20 Pokémon with your non-Basic Pokémon.
playmat.prompt.xy5_108.dragonblast: Choose a {W} Energy and a {L} Energy to discard.

tpci.2017.gamestop.gx-promo.bundle-b.nam: GameStop/EB Promotion: Bonus Pokémon-GX Evolution chain
tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q2.season2.desc: Thank you for attending your local Pokémon League! This code will unlock 4 foil promo cards featuring Oricorio (Pom-Pom Style) and a Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising themed coin for you to enjoy or trade!
tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q2.season2.name: Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising Season 2
tpci.product.battle-arena.black-kyurem.d: Black Kyurem and White Kyurem go head to head in the new Pokémon TCG Battle Arena Decks! These two 60-card decks are ready to play right away, with powerful cards and winning strategies worthy of an ace Trainer! Each deck is led by an exceptional Pokémon-EX and includes 11 foil cards. Let the battle begin!
tpci.product.battle-arena.black-kyurem.h: Two Mighty Pokémon Battle for Victory!
tpci.product.battle-arena.kyurem.title: Battle Arena Decks: Black Kyurem vs. White Kyurem
tpci.product.battle-arena.white-kyurem.d: Black Kyurem and White Kyurem go head to head in the new Pokémon TCG Battle Arena Decks! These two 60-card decks are ready to play right away, with powerful cards and winning strategies worthy of an ace Trainer! Each deck is led by an exceptional Pokémon-EX and includes 11 foil cards. Let the battle begin!
tpci.product.battle-arena.white-kyurem.h: Two Mighty Pokémon Battle for Victory!
versus.rewards.dailyreward.label: Daily Reward
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body1_b.l: Each Versus Ladder lasts 3 weeks and provides opportunities to earn cool rewards like Trainer Tokens, booster packs, and powerful Pokémon.
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body2_b.l: Versus Points are awarded each time you win a match in Versus Mode. Each victory is worth 10 points. You can earn 5 bonus points for each consecutive victory, or "Win Streak," which stacks up to 4 times for a total of 20 bonus points for each win. You'll also earn 5 bonus points if your opponent had advantage. If you lose your match, you'll earn 1 Versus Point for each Prize card you took.
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body3_b.l: Versus Rewards are unlocked and added to your Collection as you earn Versus Points. Don't take too long earning your rewards, though: Versus Ladders start over every 3 weeks with new rewards. All Versus Rewards items are not tradable.
